DOC.detailed_description: The propose study would evaluate whether exist surf therapy program part Wounded , Ill , Injured ( WII ) Wellness Program Naval Medical Center San Diego ( NMCSD ) , significantly reduce psychological symptom ( e.g. , PTSD , depression , anxiety , negative affect , lack positive affect ) physical symptom ( e.g. , pain , sleep ) among active-duty service member . Psychological physical symptom assess begin surf program program completion . In addition , brief assessment mood symptom complete individual surf therapy session .
